caption.title: Synthesis of the research related to vector species of ZIKV between 1952 and March 15, 2017.
caption.p: Evolution of the number of scientific papers related to vector species of ZIKV, the number of field species tested for the presence of Zika, the number of naturally ZIKV-infected species, the number of species studied experimentally for their competence, and the number of species observed once competent for ZIKV between 1952 and March 15, 2017. ZIKV, Zika virus.
